step_description_etxt: Go the Transport Canada Drone Management Portal and create an account. You can use a Government of Canada login (GCKey), or your online banking login (sign-in partner).
step_description_ftxt: Go the Transport Canada Drone Management Portal and create an account. You can use a Government of Canada login (GCKey), or your online banking login (sign-in partner).  (fr)

step_description_etxt:
Get this information ready:
  • purchase date (if applicable)
  • make, model, serial number, weight and type of drone
  • Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Interac card

step_description_etxt: Find something permanent to mark your drone with. We suggest a permanent marker or a label maker.
